recipe_name: Jicama Mango Salad with Cilantro and Lime
ingredients: 1 large jicama, peeled and cut into matchsticks, 1 small red bell pepper, cut into matchsticks, 1 large firm mango, peeled and cut into matchsticks,   +   1/2  red onion, cut into matchsticks
nutrition: Total Fat 0g 0%, Saturated Fat 0g 1%, Sodium 300mg 13%, Total Carbohydrate 32g 11%, Dietary Fiber 9g 32%, Total Sugars 18g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 58mg 292%, Calcium 32mg 2%, Iron 1mg 7%, Potassium 354mg 8%
